Description.Text: Nova Hotel Yerevan is a modern 4-star property offering contemporary accommodation in the heart of Yerevan. Highlights include a gym, free Wi-Fi and a good location near Freedom Square. Yerevan is the capital and largest city of Armenia, situated on the Hrazdan river. It dates back to the 8th century BC and boasts a wealth of cultural institutions. Places of interest include Republic Square, the Matenadaran (an ancient manuscripts museum), the Tsitsernakaberd (Armenian Genocide memorial) and the Cascade (a spectacular stairway). The hotel is housed in a 21st-century mid-rise building. Facilities include a spa and gym. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the premises. Standard rooms are approximately 19-24sqm and decorated in a warm style with wood furniture and carpeted floors. Amenities include air-conditioning, tea and coffee equipment, a flat-screen satellite TV, mini-bar, fridge, safe and work desk. The en-suite bathrooms feature a walk-in shower. The hotel restaurant serves Armenian specialities and international cuisine in a relaxed setting. Guests can also enjoy a range of drinks and snacks at the bar, and there are plenty of dining opportunities in the vicinity. The hotel has a 24-hour reception.
